text: Eszter Juhász (born February 23, 1988 in Hungary) is a Finnish female curler.Juhász, Eszter | Curling.fi She started curling in 2006 at the age of 18. Eszter Juhász was born in Hungary. Her family moved to Finland when Juhász was at the age of 2.Magyar Curling Szövetség » Juhász Eszter: Egyszer még éremért fogok visszajönniMagyar Curling Szövetség » Juhász Eszter ==Teams== ===Women's=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
